channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Consumer Electronics Connectivity, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-3615|2024-08-04T07:37:55.571Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20consumer%20electronics%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20consumer%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20industrial%20iot%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Valid deauth/disassoc frames is dropped in case if RMF is enabled and some rouge peer keep on sending rogue deauth/disassoc frames due to improper enum values used to check the frame subtype in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Consumer Electronics Connectivity, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile in APQ8009, APQ8053, APQ8096AU, MDM9150, MDM9206, MDM9207C, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8996AU, QCA6174A, QCA6574AU, QCA9377, QCA9379, QCN7605, QCS605, SC8180X, SDM630, SDM636, SDM660, SDM845, SDX20, SDX24, SDX55, SM8150, SXR1130
